course_description: Introduction to basic laboratory techniques in microbiology. Experiments dealing with the physiology, biochemistry, genetics, and molecular biology of microbes will be included. (This course meets the upper-level laboratory requirement and will count as elective credit for the Biology major.)
prerequisites: [(BIOL 142 and BIOL 142L) or BIOL_OX 142] as prerequisite and BIOL 370 as pre/co-requisite or equivalent transfer credit.
